00090 static inline void pm_sleep(int sleep_mode)
00091 {
00092     switch (sleep_mode) {
00093     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_IDLE:
00094         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_IDLE);
00095         break;
00096     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_IDLE:
00097         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_IDLE);
00098         break;
00099     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_FROZEN:
00100         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_FROZEN);
00101         break;
00102     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_FROZEN:
00103         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_FROZEN);
00104         break;
00105     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_STANDBY:
00106         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_STANDBY);
00107         break;
00108     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_STANDBY:
00109         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_STANDBY);
00110         break;
00111     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_STOP:
00112         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_STOP);
00113         break;
00114     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_STOP:
00115         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_STOP);
00116         break;
00117     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_DEEPSTOP:
00118         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_DEEPSTOP);
00119         break;
00120     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_DEEPSTOP:
00121         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_DEEPSTOP);
00122         break;
00123     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_STATIC:
00124         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_STATIC);
00125         break;
00126     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_STATIC:
00127         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_STATIC);
00128         break;
00129 #if UC3L
00130     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_SHUTDOWN:
00131         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_SHUTDOWN);
00132         break;
00133     case AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_SHUTDOWN:
00134         SLEEP(AVR32_PM_SMODE_GMCLEAR_MASK | AVR32_PM_SMODE_SHUTDOWN);
00135         break;
00136 #endif

00138         break;
